#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

typedef long long int lli;
typedef long int li;

// input macros
#define inp_int(t) scanf("%d",&t)

#define copy(a,b) strcpy(b,a)
// for loops
#define REP(i,j,n) for(int i=j;i<n;i++)
#define rep(i,n) REP(i,0,n)

#include <cstdio>

int count_digits(int n);
int sum_digits(int n);

int main()
{
	int k;
	int n;
	bool found;

	scanf("%d", &k);

	for (int i = 0; i < k; i++)
	{
		scanf("%d", &n);

		found = false;

		for (int j = n - (9 * count_digits(n)); j < n; j++)
		{
			if (j + sum_digits(j) == n)
			{
				printf("%d\n", j);

				found = true;

				break;
			}
		}

		if (!found)
		{
			printf("NONE\n");
		}
	}
}

int count_digits(int n)
{
	int digits = 0;

	while (n > 0)
	{
		digits++;

		n /= 10;
	}

	return digits;
}

int sum_digits(int n)
{
	int sum = 0;

	while (n > 0)
	{
		sum += (n % 10);

		n /= 10;
	}

	return sum;
}
